classitems.description: Model constructor for this database instance.

classitems.description: Returns a string representing the document.
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description: The number of documents in model.
classitems.name: length

classitems.description: Document constructor for this model instance.
classitems.name: Document

classitems.description: Query constructor for this model instance.

classitems.description: Finds a document by its identifier.
classitems.name: findById

classitems.description: Fired when a document is inserted
classitems.name: insert

classitems.description: Updates a document with a compiled stack.
classitems.name: _updateWithStack

classitems.description: Fired when a document is updated
classitems.name: updte

classitems.description: Finds a document by its identifier and update it.

classitems.description: Finds a document by its identifier and replace it.
classitems.name: replaceById

classitems.description: Finds a document by its identifier and remove it.

classitems.description: Fired when a document is removed
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: Returns an array containing all documents.
classitems.name: toArray

props.name: limit
props.description: Limits the number of documents returned.

classitems.description:
Returns the document at the specified index. `num` can be a positive or
negative number.
classitems.name: eq

classitems.description: Returns the specified range of documents.
classitems.name: slice

classitems.description: Limits the number of documents returned.
classitems.name: limit

classitems.description: Specifies the number of items to skip.
classitems.name: skip

classitems.description: Returns documents in a reversed order.
classitems.name: reverse

classitems.description: Creates an array of values by iterating each element in the collection.
classitems.name: map

classitems.description:
Reduces a collection to a value which is the accumulated result of iterating
each element in the collection.
classitems.name: reduce

params.name: initial
params.description: By default, the initial value is the first document.

classitems.description:
Reduces a collection to a value which is the accumulated result of iterating
each element in the collection from right to left.
classitems.name: reduce

params.name: initial
params.description: By default, the initial value is the last document.

classitems.description:
Creates a new array with all documents that pass the test implemented by the
provided function.
classitems.name: filter

classitems.description:
Tests whether all documents pass the test implemented by the provided
function.
classitems.name: every

classitems.description:
Tests whether some documents pass the test implemented by the provided
function.

classitems.description: Returns a getter function for normal population.
classitems.name: _populateGetter

classitems.name: _populateGetterArray

classitems.description: Populates document references with a compiled stack.
classitems.name: _populate

Returns the document at the specified index. `num` can be a positive or

Reduces a collection to a value which is the accumulated result of iterating
each element in the collection from right to left.

classitems.description:
Creates a new array with all documents that pass the test implemented by the
provided function.
classitems.name: filter

classitems.description:
Tests whether all documents pass the test implemented by the provided
function.
classitems.name: every

Tests whether some documents pass the test implemented by the provided
function.

classitems.description: Parses updating expressions and returns a stack.
classitems.name: _parseUpdate

classitems.description: Parses array of query expressions and returns a stack.
classitems.name: _parseQueryArray

classitems.description: Parses normal query expressions and returns a stack.
classitems.name: _parseNormalQuery

classitems.description: Parses query expressions and returns a stack.
classitems.name: _parseQuery

classitems.description: Parses sorting expressions and returns a stack.
classitems.name: _parseSort

classitems.description: Parses population expression and returns a stack.
classitems.name: _parsePopulate

classitems.description: The function that returns default value.
classitems.name: default

classitems.description:
Casts data. This function is used by getters to cast an object to document
instances. If the value is null, the default value will be returned.
classitems.name: cast

classitems.description: Validates data. This function is used by setters.
classitems.name: validate

classitems.description: Compares data. This function is used when sorting.
classitems.name: compare

classitems.description: Parses data. This function is used when restoring data from database files.
classitems.name: parse

classitems.description: Transforms value. This function is used when saving data to database files.
classitems.name: value

classitems.description: Checks the equality of data. Returns true if the value doesn't match.
classitems.name: q$ne

classitems.description: Checks whether `value` is less than (i.e. <) the `query`.
classitems.name: q$lt

classitems.description: Checks whether `value` is less than or equal to (i.e. <=) the `query`.
classitems.name: q$lte

classitems.description: Checks whether `value` is greater than (i.e. >) the `query`.
classitems.name: q$gt

classitems.description: Checks whether `value` is greater than or equal to (i.e. >=) the `query`.
classitems.name: q$gte

classitems.description: Checks whether `value` is equal to one of elements in `query`.
classitems.name: q$in

classitems.description: Checks whether `value` is not equal to any elements in `query`.
classitems.name: q$nin

classitems.description: Returns a nested property in an object.
classitems.name: getProp

classitems.description: Sets a nested property in an object.
classitems.name: setProp

classitems.description: Deletes a nested property in an object.
classitems.name: delProp

classitems.description: Sets a getter in an object.
classitems.name: setGetter

classitems.description: Transforms an array to a object.
classitems.name: arr2obj

classitems.description: Checks the equality of an array.
classitems.name: arrayEqual

classitems.description: Checks whether an array contains a specified value.
classitems.name: contains
parseArgs

classitems.description:
Assigns enumerable properties of objects to the first object. Properties
which exist will be overwritten by next objects.
classitems.name: extend

classitems.description: Casts an array and its child elements.
classitems.name: cast

classitems.description: Validates an array and its child elements.
classitems.name: validate

classitems.description: Compares an array by its child elements and the size of the array.
classitems.name: compare

classitems.description: Checks the equality of an array.
classitems.name: match

classitems.description: Checks whether the number of elements in an array is equal to `query`.
classitems.name: q$size

classitems.description: Checks whether an array contains one of elements in `query`.
classitems.name: q$in

classitems.description: Checks whether an array does not contain in any elements in `query`.
classitems.name: q$nin

classitems.description: Checks whether an array contains all elements in `query`.
classitems.name: q$all

classitems.description: Add elements in front of an array.
classitems.name: u$unshift

classitems.description: Removes the first element from an array.
classitems.name: u$shift

classitems.description: Removes the last element from an array.
classitems.name: u$pop

classitems.description: Add elements to an array only if the value is not already in the array.
classitems.name: u$addToSet

classitems.description: Parses data and transform them into boolean values.
classitems.name: parse

classitems.description: Transforms data into number to compress the size of database files.
classitems.name: value

classitems.description:
Casts data. Returns a new CUID only if value is null and the field is
required.
classitems.name: cast

classitems.description: Validates data. A valid CUID must be started with `c` and 25 in length.
classitems.name: validate

classitems.description: Parses data and transforms it into a date object.
classitems.name: parse

classitems.description: Transforms a date object to a string.
classitems.name: value

classitems.description: Finds data by its month. (Start from 0)
classitems.name: q$month

classitems.description: Validates data. The value must be one of elements set in the options.
classitems.name: validate

classitems.description: Divides a number by a value.
classitems.name: u$div

classitems.description: Divides a number by a value and returns the remainder.
classitems.name: u$mod

classitems.description: Updates a number if the value is greater than the current value.
classitems.name: u$max

classitems.description: Updates a number if the value is less than the current value.
classitems.name: u$min

classitems.description: Checks whether a string is equal to one of elements in `query`.
classitems.name: q$in

classitems.description: Checks whether a string is not equal to any elements in `query`.
classitems.name: q$nin
